DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the pharmacological and cognitive effects of MDA in healthy humans.
DOC.criteria: Healthy males and females age 1850 Fluent English speaker Willing and able to give written consent Body mass index > 30 or < 18 Pregnancy or lactation FOR MORE DETAILS CONTACT THE RESEARCH CLINIC.
DOC.keyword: Pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of MDA studies in healthy volunteers
